page.title: 14INMANS C.P.SCHOOL,HEDON
page.content: My school,is a modern open plan school.It has four units upper junior,lower junior,upper infant and lower infant. There are three teachers in every unit and these teachers work as teams in their units.All the teachers teach a wide range of subjects like maths, language,french,science,P.E. and topic.We also do art,story,R.E.and games.The three main subjects are maths,language and topic.The children work in groups or on their own.This means they can work at their own speed.In maths we sit in groups which seperates us from the people who are doing different things.In language we're usually writing a story or poetry, we can sit where we want to.In french we learn by having conversations with the teacher and other children.
